mapper.sql: t.fund_code as fundCode, t.fund_name as fundName, t.fund_english_name as fundEnglishName, t.fund_class as fundClass, t.fund_type as fundType, t.share_class as shareClass, t.currency_type as currencyType, t.fund_manager_code as fundManagerCode, t.custodian_code as custodianCode, t.fa_code as faCode, t.manager_fee_rate as managerFeeRate, t.specification as specification, t.fund_status as fundStatus, t.is_guaranteed_fund as isGuaranteedFund, t.is_structured_fund as isStructuredFund, t.is_multi_fund as isMultiFund, t.is_qdii_fund as isQdiiFund, t.is_etf_fund as isEtfFund, t.is_lof as isLof, t.ta_code as taCode, t.is_sync as isSync, t.ref_fund as refFund
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM fund_base_info t WHERE t.id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO fund_base_info
fund_code, fund_name, fund_english_name, fund_class, fund_type, share_class, currency_type, fund_manager_code, custodian_code, fa_code, manager_fee_rate, specification, fund_status, is_guaranteed_fund, is_structured_fund, is_multi_fund, is_qdii_fund, is_etf_fund, is_lof, ta_code, is_sync, ref_fund,
#{fundCode}, #{fundName}, #{fundEnglishName}, #{fundClass}, #{fundType}, #{shareClass}, #{currencyType}, #{fundManagerCode}, #{custodianCode}, #{faCode}, #{managerFeeRate}, #{specification}, #{fundStatus}, #{isGuaranteedFund}, #{isStructuredFund}, #{isMultiFund}, #{isQdiiFund}, #{isEtfFund}, #{isLof}, #{taCode}, #{isSync}, #{refFund},
mapper.select: SELECT t.fund_code as fundCode, t.fund_name as fundName, t.fund_english_name as fundEnglishName, t.fund_class as fundClass, t.fund_type as fundType, t.share_class as shareClass, t.currency_type as currencyType, t.fund_manager_code as fundManagerCode, t.custodian_code as custodianCode, t.fa_code as faCode, t.manager_fee_rate as managerFeeRate, t.specification as specification, t.fund_status as fundStatus, t.is_guaranteed_fund as isGuaranteedFund, t.is_structured_fund as isStructuredFund, t.is_multi_fund as isMultiFund, t.is_qdii_fund as isQdiiFund, t.is_etf_fund as isEtfFund, t.is_lof as isLof, t.ta_code as taCode, t.is_sync as isSync, t.ref_fund as refFund FROM fund_base_info a LIMIT #{firstRecord}, #{pageSize}
